title: The Corners to Stand on in the 2019 Draft | The Ringer NFL Show
description:
The guys offer their stances on every corner of the 2019 NFL draft, including when to trade up or down, which position we will remember in five years, why wide receivers are the new running backs, and where to land on Drew Lock (0:38). Then Danny Kelly drops by to break down D-lineman and the front four players in this year's draft (35:00).
Hosts: Robert Mays and Kevin Clark
Guest: Danny Kelly

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
